name: Slate
text: On Wednesday, join @felixsalmon, @EmilyRPeck  and @Three_Guineas of Slate Money for a conversation about the most important stories about business & finance.  They’ll be streaming straight from their living room to yours. Tune in on Facebook & YouTube. https://t.co/oCIfuP8S4Q

name: Slate
text:
Join @JamilahLemieux, co-host of Mom and Dad Are Fighting and Care and Feeding columnist, for a new weekly live show every Thursday night where she’ll host conversations by and for parents. The kids are asleep, and it’s time for some real talk.

https://t.co/ERXm2UE6Lu
